newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Sweden's Frontline approves ship purchase.
newsitem.headline: Sweden's Frontline approves ship purchase.

text.p: An extraordinary meeting of shareholders in shipping company Frontline AB approved a proposal to acquire six tankers, five VLCC's and one Suezmax together with two OBO vessels.
The vessels will be bought by the issue of 55.3 million new shares in Frontline, raising its share capital by 1.1 billion crowns to 2.0 billion.
After the purchase Frontline will control a wholly owned fleet of 3.1 million dwt.
